analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x1e5e75c5e30a40d28ddca7e4ee0ba6bb9b8405f5.sol#4-5)
OZTToken.oneTokenWeiPrice should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x1e5e75c5e30a40d28ddca7e4ee0ba6bb9b8405f5.sol#241)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x1e5e75c5e30a40d28ddca7e4ee0ba6bb9b8405f5.sol:
